articles.description: The LIV Golf issue has been resolved, at least as it applies to the U.S. Ryder Cup team and the PGA Championship.
articles.content:
The PGA of America has made LIV players eligible for the PGA Championship and U.S. Ryder Cup team after the organization added LIV to its list of approved tours.

articles.title: Mortgage rates drop to lowest since early February 2023 after Fed’s jumbo interest rate cut - CNN
